description: At the end of his performance at the Hustlaball, sexy go-go stud Chris Harder heads to the dressing room and comes face-to-face with his porn-crush, Falcon Exclusive Brent Corrigan! Brent compliments Chris on his show but the real show is about to begin. Chris gets down to worship Brent's fat cock then stands up and fucks the superstar's face. Brent takes charge by turning Chris over, licking his hole and fucking his ass hard. The intense session seems to last for hours ending with Brent feeding his load to his #1 fan. In a daze, Chris wonders if the whole thing was a dream, but a message scrawled on the bathroom mirror proves it was true.
title: Vegas Hustle
